+{
+"_commentcharacter" : "CHARACTER RELATED STRINGS",
+
+  "statsAch" : "Stats & Achievements",
+  "profile": "Profile",
+    "avatar": "Avatar",
+  "other" : "Other",

+  	"landingp3header" : "Consequences",

+  	"landingp2header" : "Instant Gratification",
